Package org.forgerock.openidm.managed

Class ManagedObjectSchema

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.managed.ManagedObjectSchema
public class ManagedObjectSchema extends Object
Represents a managed object's schema

      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValueException
      ScriptException

  • Method Details

    • getFields

      public Map<org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer,SchemaField> getFields()
      Returns a Map containing the schema field names and their corresponding SchemaField object.
      Returns:
      a map of the schema fields.

    • getField

      public SchemaField getField(org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer field)
      Returns a SchemaField representing a schema field corresponding to the supplied field name.
      Parameters:
      field - a JsonPointer representing a field name.
      Returns:
      a SchemaField representing a schema field.

    • hasField

      public boolean hasField(org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer field)
      Returns a boolean indicating if the supplied JsonPointer is a field declared in the schema.
      Returns:
      true if the field is declared in the schema, false otherwise.

    • getRelationshipFields

      public List<org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer> getRelationshipFields()
      Returns a List of the relationship fields.
      Returns:
      a list of relationship fields

    • getHiddenByDefaultFields

      public Map<org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer,SchemaField> getHiddenByDefaultFields()
      Returns a JsonValue object representing a map of the fields that are hidden by default. All relationship and virtual fields will be hidden by default unless the returnByDefault flag is set to true.
      Returns:
      a map of fields that are hidden by default.

    • getResourceExpansionField

      public org.forgerock.util.Pair<org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer,org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer> getResourceExpansionField(org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer field)
      Determines if the supplied JsonPointer represents a resource expanded field name or a relationship field, and if so, returns a Pair representing the relationship field's name on the left and the expanded resource's field name on the right.
      Parameters:
      field - a JsonPointer representing a field name.
      Returns:
      a Pair representing the relationship field's name on the left and the expanded resource's field name on the right, or null if the field is not an expanded field.

    • hasArrayIndexedField

      public boolean hasArrayIndexedField(org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer fieldIndexPointer)
      Returns true if the fieldIndexPointer refers to an index of an array field: ie 'roles/0'. It would not match on field expansions like 'roles/*/description'
      Parameters:
      fieldIndexPointer - the possible pointer to an index of an array field.
      Returns:
      true if the fieldIndexPointer refers to an index of an array field
